response.original_title: How to Get a Refund from Uphold (Step-by-Step Guide)
response.overview: Contact Uphold Through Official Support Uphold handles support through its online ticket system+1 *888 *574 *7167. They generally do not offer public phone support. Steps to Request a Refund: Go to the support website Click “Submit a request”+1 *888 *574 *7167 Enter your registered email address Provide transaction details (ID, date, amount) Attach screenshots if available +1 *888 *574 *7167 Submit the request
response.title: How to Get a Refund from Uphold (Step-by-Step Guide)
